components.description:
A yellow face with an open mouth wailing and streams of heavy tears flowing from closed eyes. May convey inconsolable grief but also other intense feelings, such as uncontrollable laughter, pride or overwhelming joy.

In March 2021, ðŸ˜­ Loudly Crying Face became the most popular emoji on Twitter. It held this position until January 2022, when ðŸ˜‚ Face with Tears of Joy returned as the top emoji on the platform.
components.title: Loudly Crying Face

description:
A yellow face with an open mouth wailing and streams of heavy tears flowing from closed eyes. May convey inconsolable grief but also other intense feelings, such as uncontrollable laughter, pride or overwhelming joy.

In March 2021, ðŸ˜­ Loudly Crying Face became the most popular emoji on Twitter. It held this position until January 2022, when ðŸ˜‚ Face with Tears of Joy returned as the top emoji on the platform.
title: Loudly Crying Face

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: A sad face with tears streaming down both cheeks.Â This faceÂ is distraught and inconsolable. Not to be confused with the tears of joy emoji.  http://emojipedia.org/loudly-crying-face/
emoji_net_data.name: loudly crying face

bn:00101571a: Afflicted with or marked by anxious uneasiness or trouble or grief.
Afflicted with or marked by anxious uneasiness or trouble or grief

bn:00110036a: Feeling mentally uncomfortable because something is missing or wrong.
Experiencing or showing sorrow or unhappiness- Christina Rossetti

bn:00101559a: Marked by low spirits; showing no enthusiasm

bn:00087901v: Show mirth by peculiar movement of the muscles of the face and emission of sounds.

To show mirth, satisfaction, or derision, by peculiar movement of the muscles of the face, particularly of the mouth, causing a lighting up of the face and eyes, and usually accompanied by the emission of explosive or chuckling sounds from the chest and throat; to indulge in laughter.

To express pleasure, mirth or derision by peculiar movement of the muscles of the face, particularly of the mouth, causing a lighting up of the face and eyes, and usually accompanied by the emission of explosive or chuckling sounds from the chest and throat; to produce laughter.

bn:00086122v: Shed tears because of sadness, rage, or pain
To shed tears due to the impact of an emotion.

bn:00084314v: Separate or cause to separate abruptly

bn:00084388v: To cry out with a shrill voice; to utter a sudden, sharp outcry, or shrill, loud cry, as in fright or extreme pain; to shriek; to screech.
To utter a sudden and loud outcry, as in joy, triumph, or exultation, or to attract attention, to animate soldiers, etc.
To utter a sudden and loud outcry.
To speak with a loud, excited voice.
To utter in a loud or distinct voice.

bn:00095465v: Disturb the balance or stability of

bn:00059926n: Sports: unexpected victory of a competitor.

An upset occurs in a competition, frequently in electoral politics or sports, when the party popularly expected to win, is defeated by an underdog whom the majority expects to lose, defying the conventional wisdom.
In a contest, especially in sport, when an underdog beats the strong favourite
An unexpected victory of a competitor that was not favored.

bn:00026402n: State of physical and/or psychological dejectedness, which can lead to unhappiness, pessimism and mistrust.
A mental state characterized by a pessimistic sense of inadequacy and a despondent lack of activity
Depression is a state of low mood and aversion to activity that can affect a person's thoughts, behavior, feelings and sense of well-being.
A state of low mood, also known as melancholy
State of low mood and aversion to activity

bn:00068782n: Sadness is emotional pain associated with, or characterized by feelings of disadvantage, loss, despair, helplessness, sorrow, and rage.
Emotions experienced when not in a state of well-being
Sadness is emotional pain associated with, or characterized by feelings of disadvantage, loss, despair, helplessness and sorrow.

bn:00014793n: A loud utterance; often in protest or opposition

bn:00076312n: A single tear (clear, salty liquid secreted by the eye).
A drop of clear, salty liquid produced from the eyes by crying or irritation.

A clear, salty liquid produced by the lacrimal gland in the eye, whose normal function is to clean and lubricate the eyes; its production is increased when the eye is irritated, or when yawning, laughing or crying.
A drop of liquid produced from the eyes by crying or irritation.
A drop of the clear salty saline solution secreted by the lacrimal glands
Drop of clear salty liquid from the eyes.

bn:00024162n: Lacrimation, or lachrymation, is the secretion of tears, which often serves to clean and lubricate the eyes in response to an irritation of the eyes.
Shedding tears as a response to an emotional state in humans
Tears are the secretions of the glands that clean and lubricate the eyes.
The process of shedding tears (usually accompanied by sobs or other inarticulate sounds)
Crying is the shedding of tears in response to an emotional state in humans.

apple_vendor_description: The loudly crying face emoji on Apple devices is a masterclass in expressive design, featuring two large, bright blue tears streaming from wide, downturned eyes. Its cheeks are dramatically flushed red, and its mouth is open in a wailing expression, all rendered with Appleâ€™s signature smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges. This emoji conveys intense sadness, overwhelming emotion, or hysterical laughter with a vivid, almost tangible depth thatâ€™s instantly recognizable on Apple devices.
